snippet: The Republican-controlled State Assembly on Thursday approved a measure banning abortion after 20 weeks of pregnancy except in a medical emergency.
abstract: Wisconsin State Assembly passes bill that would ban abortion after 20 weeks of pregnancy except in medical emergencies; Gov Scott Walker is expected to sign it into law.
lead_paragraph: The Republican-controlled State Assembly on Thursday approved a measure banning abortion after 20 weeks of pregnancy except in a medical emergency.

headline.main: Wisconsin: 20-Week Limit for Abortions Is Passed
headline.print_headline: Wisconsin: 20-Week Limit for Abortions Is Passed
